title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: Blended Instructional Design and Community of Practice-Based Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic calculus, linear algebra, and foundational experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: The learner can design mathematical modeling for real-life problem-solving through CoP (Community of Practice)-based collaboration in blended learning environments
The learner can accurately explain more than 80% of calculus concepts using digital tools and offline discussions
The learner can revise and improve their learning strategies at least three times through a peer feedback system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
